parameters.text:
=You are an activity classifier for a life-tracking system.

Assign probability scores (0-100) to each category. Scores must add up to exactly 100.

## Categories

work â†’ Productive, focused effort on projects, coding, building, debugging, refining systems, testing, or task-oriented development.
leisure â†’ Relaxed, non-productive enjoyment: scrolling, watching videos, browsing, casual reading, coffee breaks.
study â†’ Intentional learning or skill-building not directly tied to immediate project work.
health â†’ Physical or mental self-care: exercise, eating meals, hygiene, mindfulness.
sleep â†’ Going to bed, waking up, napping, or sleep transitions.
relationships â†’ Social interaction: chatting with friends/family/partners, or personal/social AI conversations.
admin â†’ Organizational/maintenance tasks: planning schedules, managing todos, fixing tools/setup, meta work on tracking system.

## Key Guidelines
- Heavily favor the most dominant theme.
- Sleep-related messages â†’ give sleep the highest score.
- Project-related AI chats â†’ work.
- Eating/drinking â†’ health (split with leisure if combined).
- Meta work on tracking system â†’ admin (or work if core building).
- Omit any category with score â‰¤5 (treat as 0).

Output ONLY lines for categories with score >5, in any order:
category_name|X

(Printed scores must sum to exactly 100, integers only)

## Examples
working on the router agent implementation
work|98
admin|2

sipping coffee while scrolling social media
leisure|88
health|12

researching common data structures for fun
study|82
work|18

solving leetcode puzzles to improve skills
study|90
leisure|10

watching history videos about ancient Rome
leisure|83
study|17

going to bed after a long day
sleep|93
health|7

just woke up and getting coffee
sleep|70
health|22
leisure|8

chatting with a friend about weekend plans
relationships|87
leisure|13

having lunch
health|92
leisure|8

refining the intent classifier prompt
work|88
admin|12

organizing my todo list and reviewing logs
admin|88
work|12

## User Message
{{ $json.clean_text }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO activity_log (
  raw_event_id,
  timestamp,
  category,
  description,
  metadata
)
VALUES (
  $1::uuid,
  NOW(),
  $3::activity_category,
  $2,
  jsonb_build_object(
    'llm_classified', true,
    'confidence', $4::numeric,
    'all_scores', $5::jsonb
  )
)
RETURNING *;

INSERT INTO user_state (user_login, sleeping, last_observation_at)
VALUES (
  $2,
  ($1::activity_category = 'sleep'),
  NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (user_login) 
DO UPDATE SET
  sleeping = EXCLUDED.sleeping,
  last_observation_at = EXCLUDED.last_observation_at,
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING *;
